title: France Shocked That Frenchman Is A Knife-Wielding ISIS Militant
teaser: Officials confirmed that at least 1 Frenchman appears in a video that shows the beheaded bodies of an American and 18 Syrian soldiers. Maxime Hauchard left France in 2013 to join militants in Syria.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
